fields.message:
Dear %%lead_first_name%%

Thank you for your interest in New Age. We offer a large variety of products with features and price points that cover all of our customers' needs. Come by and have a look.

Regards

%%sales_rep_name%%
%%dealership_name%%
fields.name: Customer Introductory Email
fields.subject: Thank you for your interest in New Age!

fields.message:
Dear %%lead_first_name%%

Thank you for placing your trust in New Age Caravans. Your order will be delivered in 2 weeks.

Thanks

%%sales_rep_name%%
%%dealership_name%%
fields.name: Order Thanks Email
fields.subject: Thank you for your Order!

fields.message:
Dear %%lead_first_name%%

At New Age, we never want to lose a good customer. Which is why we give you a life-time discounted purchase offer of 5%, in case you change your mind and want to buy a caravan from us again. Thank you for your interest.

Regards

%%sales_rep_name%%
%%dealership_name%%
fields.name: Email to no more interested customers
fields.subject: We are sad to see you go!
